task: I think I have something scheduled for this Friday night, but I am not sure. I think it might be a movie night. If that's the case, could you please look up the latest movies and make a recommendation list for me? Save the recommendation list in text form.

items.thought: The agent opens the calendar to check any schedule for this friday.
items.action: The agent finds there's indeed a movie night schedule.

items.thought: Search for details for information about latest movies.
items.action: Extract details from search results on the Google page.

items.thought: Open the text file to insert the recommendation.
